author: الوطن
title: Ground News - Mustafa Hosni: The martyrs have faced the “people of evil” to keep our state strong
text:
Summary by الوطن The Islamic preacher Mustafa Hosni participated in the celebration of Martyrs' Day today and spoke to the children of the martyrs, saying: “Do you know the next time we will see Papa and what will be the Day of Judgement Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
